summary: A werewolf is a person who can turn into a wolf, often linked to a full moon. The idea comes from European folklore, with stories dating back to ancient times. People once believed in werewolves and even tried and punished those accused of being one, especially during the witch hunts. These beliefs later inspired horror stories and movies. The concept has evolved over time, blending with witchcraft and becoming a popular theme in modern fantasy and horror.
title: Werewolf
